Q3a-classification-trends.name: name
Q3a-classification-trends.question: What can be observed from the global distribution of tidal range and character?

options.a: Semi-diurnal and mainly semi-diurnal mixed tides tend to have smaller tidal ranges than diurnal and mainly diurnal mixed tides.
options.b: Most of the worlds's coastlines experience either diurnal or mainly diurnal mixed tides.
options.c: Diurnal and mainly diurnal mixed tides are mostly found at low latitudes.
options.d: Semi-enclosed seas tend to have a relatively large tidal range.

feedback.correct: Correct! Well done. Section 4.4.1. of the book explains this in detail.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect, please study Section 4.4.1. of the book and try again.

Q3a-semi-diurnal-TC12.name: name
Q3a-semi-diurnal-TC12.question: In a semi-diurnal environment, spring tide occurs for tidal constituents TC1 and TC2 every D1 days. Select TC1 and TC2.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect, please try again. You may have to go back to the open questions above.

Q3a-semi-diurnal-D1.name: Q7
Q3a-semi-diurnal-D1.question: In a semi-diurnal environment, spring tide occurs for tidal constituents TC1 and TC2 every D1 days. What is the duration of D1 in days (use four significant figures)?

Q3a-diurnal-TC34.name: name
Q3a-diurnal-TC34.question: In a diurnal environment, spring tide occurs for tidal constituents TC3 and TC4 every D2 days. Select TC3 and TC4.

feedback.incorrect: Incorrect, please try again. You may have to go back to the open questions above.

Q3a-diurnal-D2.name: name
Q3a-diurnal-D2.question: In a diurnal environment, spring tide occurs for tidal constituents TC3 and TC4 every D2 days. What is the duration of D2 in days (use four significant figures)?

Q3a-semi-diurnal-month12.name: name
Q3a-semi-diurnal-month12.question: Strongest semi-diurnal tides are found around the 21st of the months Month1 and Month2, as can be seen from adding constituents TC5 and TC6. Select Month1 and Month2.

feedback.correct: Correct! Well done. These are the Spring and Autumnal Equinoxes.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect, please try again. You may have to go back to the open questions above.

Q3a-semi-diurnal-TC56.name: name
Q3a-semi-diurnal-TC56.question: Strongest semi-diurnal tides are found around the 21st of the months Month1 and Month2, as can be seen from adding constituents TC5 and TC6. Select TC5 and TC6.

feedback.correct: Correct! Well done. Have you computed the beat length? Check that is is 182.6 days.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect, please try again. You may have to go back to the open questions above.

Q3a-diurnal-month34.name: name
Q3a-diurnal-month34.question: Strongest diurnal tides are found around the 21st of the months Month3 and Month4, as can be seen from adding constituents TC7 and TC8. Select Month3 and Month4.

feedback.correct: Correct! Well done. These are the Summer and Winter solstices.
feedback.incorrect: Incorrect, please try again. You may have to go back to the open questions above.
